message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,100,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of the significant benefits it will bring to your operations.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price.  However,  $900,000 undervalues the true potential of this product. Let's meet in the middle â€“ I propose $1,000,000.

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit higher than that. I'm thinking more along the lines of $950,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me and the market value.
